original_title: BABYMETAL - Awakens - The Sun Also Rises
overview: “BABYMETAL AWAKENS -THE SUN ALSO RISES-” was held at the Yokohama Arena for two days, on June 28th (Friday) and 29th (Saturday), 2019. A set of Blu-ray and live CDs featuring the performance, which was the first to be performed after entering the new chapter “METAL RESISTANCE EPISODE VIII”, was decided to be sold exclusively to THE ONE members!
title: BABYMETAL - Awakens - The Sun Also Rises
